original_title: Cada Um Com Seu Cada Qual
overview: Camilla, an 8-year-old girl, sees a cardboard box fall from a "donkey without a tail" and tries to return it to its owner - a paper taster. The man gives her the old box. Upon arriving home, Camila finds a camera in the box - and then begins her adventure.
title: Cada Um Com Seu Cada Qual
